MDPManager.summary: Class to manage the creation of the underlying MDP data and functions. In other words, this creates the model of the environment.

remarks.para: For the handling the generation of the in game MDP object see:

ExecuteAction.summary: Uses the index (int) representation of the state and an action to calculate the successor state (again represented as by its index) for the model representation of the environment.
ExecuteAction.param: int representing the state index, rather than the state itself
ExecuteAction.returns: int representing the index of the successor state
